Sentencas: Precursor powders of La0.6Sr0 4CoO3-delta (LSC) and composite powders of LSC precursor and Ce0.8Gd0 2O2-delta (CGO) were prepared by Sol-Gel process.
Titulo: Fabrication and Characterization of Functionally Graded Cathodes Based on in-situ Formed La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ for Intermediate Temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: The precursor powders of LSC were characterized by TGA, XRD, BET and exhibited homogeneity and high specific surface area.
Titulo: Fabrication and Characterization of Functionally Graded Cathodes Based on in-situ Formed La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ for Intermediate Temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: XRD analysis indicated that single phase of LSC can be formed after calcination at high temperature in Ar and annealing at 850 degrees C for 2 h in air, which corresponds to the fabrication and annealing condition of functionally graded cathode before SOFC stack operation.
Titulo: Fabrication and Characterization of Functionally Graded Cathodes Based on in-situ Formed La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ for Intermediate Temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: Functionally graded cathode of LSC/CGO precursor and LSC precursor were sintered at 900-1000 degrees C in Ar, which were deposited on NiO/YSZ anode supported half cell with YSZ as electrolyte layer and CGO as barrier layer.
Titulo: Fabrication and Characterization of Functionally Graded Cathodes Based on in-situ Formed La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ for Intermediate Temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: Microstructural analysis by SEM and EDX indicated that graded cathode contacted well with CGO layer.
Titulo: Fabrication and Characterization of Functionally Graded Cathodes Based on in-situ Formed La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ for Intermediate Temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: It was found that SrZrO3 was formed at the YSZ-CGO boundary.
Titulo: Fabrication and Characterization of Functionally Graded Cathodes Based on in-situ Formed La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ for Intermediate Temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: The test of single SOFC cells with in-situ formed LSC showed that cell performance was improved with decrease of the sintering temperature.
Titulo: Fabrication and Characterization of Functionally Graded Cathodes Based on in-situ Formed La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ for Intermediate Temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: In comparison, the best cell performance was achieved at the sintering temperature 900 degrees C.
Titulo: Fabrication and Characterization of Functionally Graded Cathodes Based on in-situ Formed La0.6Sr0.4CoO3-δ for Intermediate Temperature SOFCs
